thread.section_title: New product topics in Answer HQ
thread.title: CAREER MODE 2 BUGS

author: laurynas776
title: CAREER MODE 2 BUGS
text:
een uur geleden
Dear EA Support,
I am experiencing two issues in Career Mode in EA Sports FC 25:
Youth Scout Reports: When my youth scouts return with their reports, I am unable to open them. Every time I try, I get a screen that just shows "null." Despite this, I know that the players are being scouted and their information is available in the system, but I cannot view it due to this bug.
Player Growth Indicators: I have noticed that the "+" or "-" indicators next to players' ratings in the Squad Hub (which show how much their stats have grown or declined) are no longer visible. The players are still growing, but I canâ€™t see the exact amount of progress as I used to.
Could you please assist me with resolving these issues? Any help or guidance would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you in advance for your support.
Best regards,
Probeer eerst deze stappen als je problemen ondervindt bij het verbinden met een EA-game.
We controleren of jij het bent door je een code te sturen voor je vertrouwde apparaten.
